name: Dell Streak 7
des: Introducing Dell™ Streak 7. Share photos, videos and movies together. It’s small enough to carry around, big enough to gather around.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab™
des: Feel Free to Tab™. The Samsung Galaxy Tab™ brings you an ultra-mobile entertainment experience through its 7” display, high-power processor and Adobe® Flash® Player compatibility.

name: T-Mobile G2
des: The T-Mobile G2 with Google is the first smartphone built for 4G speeds on T-Mobile's new network. Get the information you need, faster than you ever thought possible.
